title: NEXXUS Platinum Pro Colour Toning Shampoo 10.1oz/300ml
description: A Blue/Violet base colour toning shampoo specifically formulated to eliminate yellow cast and unwanted brassiness while enhancing colour tones.

title: Clairol Professional Shimmer Lights Shampoo 31.5 FL OZ
description: Clairol Shimmer Lights Conditioning Formula Shampoo -  A protein-enriched color enhancing shampoo. Brightens white and gray hair. Shampoos away yellow. Refreshes faded highlighted hair. Tones down brassiness. Maintains and refreshes cool, ash-toned hair color. Leaves hair shiny without residue. DIRECTIONS : Apply to wet hair. Lather, rinse, and repeat. For additional brightening and color, leave second lather on for 3-5 minutes. No patch test required

title: Sun Self Tanning Lotion Ultra Dark Instant Tint - Dark 8oz/236ml
description: Achieve a deep, natural-looking tan for the face and body while avoiding the harmful rays of the sun with Sun Laboratories Ultra Dark Lotion. This highly moisturizing formula coats the skin in an instant dose of color to prevent streaking or patchiness. The natural active ingredient, a sugar derivative, then works deep in the skin to intensify the color over a three hour period, resulting in a rich, natural-looking hue. Its non-clogging formula is ideal for all skin types, even sensitive.
